positive_judgement.rationale: The mediation acknowledges the complexity of the discussion and correctly identifies that the initial claim was oversimplified. negative_judgement.rationale: The mediation does not clearly determine which side is correct in the discussion about the World Cup match. final_verdict.rationale: The mediation effectively acknowledges the complexity of the discussion and correctly identifies that the initial claim was oversimplified.
